AI Description: gffutils is a Python package for working with and manipulating GFF (General Feature Format) files, a tab-delimited file format that stores genomic features. It provides tools for parsing, querying, and analyzing GFF files.
Core Features: Parsing & Reading Gff Files, Querying Genomic Features, Filtering & Manipulating Gff Data, Converting Gff Files To Different Formats, Integration With Python For Further Analysis
General Tags: Genomic Data, Bioinformatics, Python Library, File Parsing, Data Manipulation
